content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the GoAbroad website and found out that Spain is the most popular destination for meaningful travel, followed by China, Japan, England, France, the United States, Australia, South Korea, Italy, and Germany. Lonely Planet recommends various travel destinations across the world, including Africa, Antarctica, Asia, the Caribbean Islands, Central America, Europe, the Middle East, North America, the Pacific, and South America. According to Tripadvisor, some of the top travel destinations include Kitzbuhel and Saalbach-Hinterglemm in Austria, Prague and Karlovy Vary in the Czech Republic, Krakow in Poland, Budapest in Hungary, and Zell am See and Yellowstone National Park in the United States.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.ef.com/", "question": "What language courses does EF offer?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: EF offers language courses for people of all ages, including 10-14 year olds, 14-18 year olds, 18-25 year olds, and adults 25+. They also offer a language year abroad program, high school abroad program, and university abroad program. EF has accredited language campuses in 50 destinations around the world. The text does not provide information about what specific languages are offered. \n \n Links: ['Menu (https://www.ef.com/)', ' (https://www.ef.com/)', '296 333 810 (tel:296333810)', 'DomůVítejte v EF (https://www.ef.com/)', 'Všechny programyPodívejte se, co všechno děláme (https://www.ef.com/pg/)']"}]
"""
